channel.title: Boot on My digital brain
channel.description: Recent content in Boot on My digital brain

item.title: No HDD space left for ubuntu update, make some space at /boot
item.description: your hd is full, make space in /boot make a cd /boot ls -la so you see the `/boot` folder now delete the stuff you don’t need anymore: sudo aptitude remove linux-image-3.13.0-49-generic sudo apt-get remove ... (ls -la after deleting the linux kernel image)
